plugins.name: prd-builder
plugins.description: Generate production-ready Product Requirements Documents through structured discovery, version coaching, and iterative refinement. 6-phase workflow with 10 reference files.

plugins.name: build-journal
plugins.description: Auto-captures build metadata during coding sessions and generates tiered retrospective documents with session-start hooks and interview templates.

plugins.name: tech-news-briefing
plugins.description: Autonomous daily tech news briefing agent. Researches 12 sources, curates stories into tiered markdown, pushes to GitHub, and emails the briefing.
